1: Vaccines don’t cause austism (correlation is not causation; and the correlation is bunk).

2: She did not “lose” her son.  She lost the idealised image she had of a person who didn’t exist.

3: Vaccines save lives. So, she willing to kill people to not prevent autism.https://twitter.com/ShireenQudosi/status/1139023857912729601 …

1147551597867802625.text: I have aspberger's, a form of autism. So does my son. My young cousin is also autistic. For someone to equate the fake risk of autism with possible death & disfigurement, angers me. I feel so sorry for her son. Not because he has autism, because he has an asshole for a parent.

1147564480576012288.text:
Stupidity can cause death, however. Thanks to her, and others like her, and others that profit from said stupidity, people die.
Kind of a twisted take on the Darwin Awards...

1147552216368275456.text: Autism isn't the end of the fucking world, it's not a death sentence, it just means you're not neurotypical. That's all. Yes, there are challenges it brings but there are also gifts. That she cant see that, and needs an external factor to blame says much about her. I pity her boy
